pages.text: Our Menu Jim ’N Nick’s is Open for Dine In, To Go, Drive Thru & Catering Prices and menu items may vary by location Visiting our Niceville, FL location? Download Niceville Menu SALADS, POTATOES & SOUPS Ranch • Bar-B-Q Ranch • Vinaigrette • Honey Mustard • Blue Cheese Dressings Bar-B-Q Salad** Bacon, cheddar cheese, cucumbers, tomatoes, almonds and homemade croutons, topped with smoked pulled pork or chickenOption: Substitute beef brisket Chopped Southern Salad** Smoked chicken, smoked onions and sweet corn, cheddar cheese, bacon, cucumber, tomatoes, almonds and homemade croutons, tossed in house-made vinaigrette Not-So-Naked Potato (GF) A large baked potato topped with bacon, cheddar cheese, butter, sour cream and scallions Loaded Bar-B-Q Baker (GF) A huge baked potato topped with your choice of smoked meat, bacon, cheddar cheese, scallions, butter, sour cream and barbecue sauce Our Famous Brisket Chili (GF) Homemade chili made with our smoked brisket • Cup Bowl Soup and Salad A cup of our famous Brisket Chili with a House Salad** Trimmings Baked Beans GFPotato Salad GFColeslaw GF Mac & CheeseBar-B-Q Corn on the Cob GFCollard Greens GFFrench FriesFresh Fruit GF Substitute Not-So-Naked Potato GFOnion RingsBrisket Chili GFHouse Salad** Starters Onion Rings Hand-breaded and crispy Small Basket Large Basket to share Loaded queso White queso with pico de gallo and jalapeno cheddar sausage. We're always looking for great talent to join the JNN team. Browse available positions from Servers and Kitchen Staff to Hosts and Managers. We're excited to hear from you. Browse Jobs What does community mean to us? Everything. Hey, we love barbecue. We love preparing it, we love serving it, and we really love eating it. But most of all, we love the way it brings people together. Our Community Search for a Jim 'N Nick's
